title: YMDUCH Women's Casual Short Sleeve Boat Neck Ruched High Split Bodycon Long Party Dress
description: Fabric:double layers,it won't be seen through.the fabric is slightly elastic and skin-friendly,comfortable with your movements.

Features:women's high split ruched maxi dress, short sleeve, slim fit, a lace-up waist finishes the dress to allow you to cinch in to your preference.twisting your front waist design can show off your attractive hips, side high split fully shows the proportion of the slender legs,while the air flow when walking brings a cool feeling to the legs,trendy and unique design make you more attractive.
Size : S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10，L=US 12-14，XL=US 16-18, Size dimension details mentioned in description.Please check it before you buy!
Occasion:womens formal bodycon maxi dress suitable for wedding,prom,cocktail,christmas,vocation,evening party,causal,evening,date,nightout,club,dinner and other occasions.
Match:you can match with your jacket coat in cool days in spring or fall,or dress it up with a pair of flats or sandals and earings in summer.
